{
  "data": {
    "extracted_information": "Web3Privacy Now is a research project focused on building a culture of privacy in web3, maintaining an extensive database of privacy-enhancing solutions, a framework for PEDApps ideation, and a use-cases database. It is an open-source collaborative project.",
    "specifications": {
      "project_name": "Web3Privacy Now",
      "license": "CC0-1.0 license",
      "github_stars": 444,
      "github_forks": 120,
      "contributors_count": 77,
      "external_links": [
        "https://docs.web3privacy.info/get-involved/index",
        "https://web3privacy.info"
      ],
      "data_repository": "https://github.com/web3privacy/explorer-data",
      "web_explorer_dashboard": "http://explorer.web3privacy.info"
    },
    "features": [],
